main_definition: A measure of the size or extent of an object, space, or concept along a particular direction.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Physical measurement of length, width, and height
meanings_and_examples.example: When measuring a room, we consider its dimensions in terms of footage (length x width).

meanings_and_examples.definition: A particular aspect or feature that defines something
meanings_and_examples.example: In mathematics, the dimension refers to the number of coordinates needed to describe an object.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The nature and scope of a conceptual idea
meanings_and_examples.example: When discussing the dimensions of poverty, we consider factors like income, education, and healthcare access.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A direction in which an object can be extended or moved
meanings_and_examples.example: The three spatial dimensions are length, width, and height.
